summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Corte&Recorte YouTube video clipping application. All core functionality working correctly including real video processing, clip generation, manual editing, and bulk downloads.
passed_tests: Backend API root endpoint responding correctly
Job creation with real YouTube URLs (Rick Astley video)
Real video processing with yt-dlp + ffmpeg integration
Job progress tracking and status updates
Clip generation with thumbnails and metadata
Manual clip editing via PATCH endpoint (title, caption, time range)
Bulk download functionality returning ZIP files
List jobs endpoint working after data validation fix
Frontend homepage loading with proper branding
Job creation form with URL input, style, and language selection
Results page displaying generated clips with previews

success_percentage.backend: 100% - All API endpoints working with real video processing
success_percentage.frontend: 95% - All major features working, minor navigation selector issues resolved
